content: {A想象}Who'd have thought the river over there'd be home to these little guys... Judging by those tails, I imagine they can deliver quite the slap. <style=SizeSmall>Wonder if they'd go well in a tea blend?</style>
info: 第二瓶星壤-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Ah, this jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> filled up while you were fishing by the river. Here, take it and continue using it to water the Luca Seedling.
info: 第二瓶星壤-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: The planet shall continue to grow, perhaps with more things that'd make a great-tasting cup of tea... Hoho, that is to say, more new lifeforms and vitality.
info: 第二瓶星壤-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本
